Description: Rim sherd of Chian Simple Animal Style pottery chalice; white slip; interior: reserved band at rim, glazed streaky black below; lotus bud in added white outline with trace of added red above single white band; exterior: two brown lines below rim, reserved below with at bottom left trace of undetermined motif.
Curator's comments: For a parallel, see Cambridge Museum of Classical Archaeology NA86 and Lemos no. 1068 from Old Smyrna.
Bibliographic references: Lemos 1991 / Archaic Pottery of Chios. The Decorated Styles (p. 301, no. 1085)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.1034) (phase 2)
